titles.title: Mortgage and Rental Assistance Reauthorization Act of 2002
To amend the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to reauthorize the temporary mortgage and rental payments program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: 9/12/2002--Introduced. Mortgage and Rental Assistance Reauthorization Act of 2002 - Amends the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to authorize the President to provide temporary assistance in the form of mortgage or rental payments for individuals and families who, because of financial hardship caused by a major disaster occurring on or after May 30, 2002, certify that they face dispossession or eviction from a residence by reason of a foreclosure of any mortgage or lien, cancellation of any contract of sale, or termination of any lease, entered into prior to such disaster. Limits the duration of assistance to a period of financial hardship of up to 18 months.
